resources.string:
What"'"s new in this release
 
 We got behind on Location fixes over the holidays and haven"'" caught up yet. This release contains all the location fixes we have to date. It will be followed by another location fix release as soon as I get caught up. And that will be followed by a release enabling Active911 registration. Hang on, it is coming.
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Porter County, IN
 Prince Charles County, MD
 Washington County, MD
 Oneida County, NY
 Cabarrus County, NC
 Forsyth County, NC
 Mecklenburg County, NC
 Rowan County, NC
